b'Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru: Trinkle S:

He was adopted for the sole purpose of working both publicly and secretly for his daughter Orihime, who was next in line to inherit the business. That\xe2\x80\x99s why he did not hesitate when he was asked by Yukitaka to attend the same school as her and serve as her bodyguard in secret.

The only problem was that her school was the refined Saint Ceral Girls\xe2\x80\x99 Academy, which was closed to boys. He didn\xe2\x80\x99t know it at the time, but it would be a major turning point in his life.
